entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning then increasing to 60 gusting to 80 late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
